descriptionEffect:
Your Worker may move 
into an opponent 
Worker’s space by 
forcing their Worker 
to the space yours 
just vacated.

Your Worker may move 
one additional time, 
but not back to its 
initial space.

If one of your 
Workers moved up on 
your last turn, 
opponent Workers 
cannot move up this 
turn.

Your Worker may build 
a dome at any level.

Your Worker may build 
one additional time, 
but not on the same 
space.

Your Worker may build 
one additional 
block(not dome)on top 
of your first block.

Your Worker may move 
into an opponent 
Worker’s space, if 
their Worker can be 
forced one space 
straight backwards to 
an unoccupied space 
at any level.

You also win if your 
Worker moves down two 
or more levels.

If your Worker 
does not move up, it 
may build both before 
and after moving
